Detailed Description

Configuration parameters of NSF3.

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissNsf3Config::bypass

Bypass all processing, so that output = input, but maintain the same latency

vpsissNsf3EdgeEnhnceConfig_t vpsissNsf3Config::eeCfg

Edge Enhancement Configuration

uint32_t vpsissNsf3Config::enableBorderReplicate

enables/Disables replication of border lines and pixels so that top and bottom 7 lines and left and right 8 pixels are not lost

uint32_t vpsissNsf3Config::enableChromaDeSatur

Enables/Disables Chroma DeSaturation

uint32_t vpsissNsf3Config::hhSubbandMax[VPS_ISS_NSF3_MAX_COLOR][VPS_ISS_NSF3_SUPPRESSION_MAX_LEVEL]

HH subband suppression max

uint32_t vpsissNsf3Config::lhSubbandMax[VPS_ISS_NSF3_MAX_COLOR][VPS_ISS_NSF3_SUPPRESSION_MAX_LEVEL]

LH and HL subband suppression max

vpsissNsf3NoiseThrshldConfig_t vpsissNsf3Config::nsCfg

Noise Threshold Configuration

vpsissNsf3OpMode_t vpsissNsf3Config::opMode

Mode of Operations, depends on input data type

vpsissNsf3ShadeGainConfig_t vpsissNsf3Config::sgCfg

Shading Gain Configuration
